traits.desc: PAWN is abnormally receptive to the ebb and flow of mana, PAWN will gain mana 40% faster than normal but PAWN's maximum mana capacity is reduced by 20.
PAWN has an increased resistance to the ebb and flow of mana which allows PAWN to hold an additional 40 mana, but reduces PAWN's mana regeneration by 20%.

PAWN excels at combat arts and is able to execute combat maneuvers 40% more frequently, however, PAWN's talent has fostered an arrogant attitude that reduces PAWN's experience gain by 25% and causes other fighters to dislike PAWN.
PAWN has accepted that death is another part of life and doesn't get upset when learning about a dead ally or seeing one of the undead.
PAWN has been reanimated as an undead.

traits.desc:
PAWN is a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. PAWN's carefree personality has kept PAWN's from developing class abilities. Instead, PAWN has learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow PAWN to adapt to any situation.
		
Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, their wanderlust will cause them to suffer a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long.

traits.desc: PAWN has a strange genetic strain that grants her enhanced physical attributes. She is also extremely attractive with an exotic facial structure that captures the eye. A succubus is more likely to exploit her physical advantages and have others do her work for her. PAWN's succubus charm has its disadvantages and can cause some to become jealous and even despise PAWN.

The warlock can occasionally affect the outcome of a social interaction using their mental capabilities, regardless of how the interaction actually occurred.

traits.desc:
PAWN is a Psionic - able to manifest mental willpower into raw energy without the use of a psychic amplifier. PAWN is able to project psionic energy but finds it easier and more efficient to apply it as an extension and augmentation of PAWN's body. For this reason, PAWN prefers to be free of encumbering weapons.

PAWN has become less social since developing psionic powers since PAWN can perform any task on PAWN's own and can do without the jealousy of others.

*The regeneration rate of psionic energy is based on psychic sensitivity - reducing sensitivity to 0 will prevent psionic energy from regenerating.

traits.desc: PAWN is a Monk, dedicated to mastering Chi - the energy that connects all life in the universe. PAWN harnesses Chi to create magical effects and exceed PAWN's physical capabilities. PAWN is also able to disrupt the Chi in others, affecting their command over spells and abilities.

traits.desc: As a Commander, PAWN exhibits a charismatic personality and stalwart presence that makes other pawns want to follow PAWN's lead. Commander's utilize the weight of their presence to inspire nearby pawns, and when that's not enough, they can issue orders that drive their followers to victory. Because PAWN is used to everyone doing PAWN's bidding, PAWN considers menial tasks beneath PAWN's status, and is generally a lackluster worker.
